ci_support_linux_64_python_min3.10.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
python_min:
- '3.10'

about.description: Dagster is a system for building modern data applications. Combining an elegant programming model and beautiful tools, Dagster allows infrastructure engineers, data engineers, and data scientists to seamlessly collaborate to process and produce the trusted, reliable data needed in today's world.
about.summary: Package for Spark Dagster framework components.

about.description: Dagster is a system for building modern data applications. Combining an elegant programming model and beautiful tools, Dagster allows infrastructure engineers, data engineers, and data scientists to seamlessly collaborate to process and produce the trusted, reliable data needed in today's world.
about.summary: Package for Spark Dagster framework components.

name: dagster-spark
raw_meta_yaml:
# yaml-language-server: $schema=https://raw.githubusercontent.com/prefix-dev/recipe-format/main/schema.json
schema_version: 1

context:
  # source-of-truth
  version: "0.28.15"
  python_max: "3.14"
  # to be adjusted to match `conda-forge-pinning` per Python EOL
  real_python_min: "3.10"
  # derived
  patch_version: ${{ (version | split('.'))[2] }}
  dagster: dagster ==1.12.${{ patch_version }}
  # snowflake
  ## see https://github.com/conda-forge/snowflake-snowpark-python-feedstock/pull/95
  python_snowflake_max: "3.13"
  ## see https://github.com/conda-forge/dagster-libs-feedstock/issues/203
  python_snowflake_pyspark_max: "3.12"
  # utility
  pip_install: -m pip install . -vv --no-deps --no-build-isolation --disable-pip-version-check

recipe:
  name: dagster-libs
  # the epoch is due to a historic issue with `conda-build` outputs
  # https://github.com/conda-forge/dagster-feedstock/issues/301
  version: 1!${{ version }}

build:
  number: 0

outputs:
  # A
  - package:
      name: dagster-airbyte
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-airbyte/dagster_airbyte-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 5e139db886af7be0bd3e6768029798c098f075510a74372b2877f19c612fbe94
    build:
      noarch: python
      skip: python_min != real_python_min
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
      python:
        entry_points:
          - dagster-airbyte = dagster_airbyte.cli:main
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        - requests
    tests:
      - python:
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
          imports:
            - dagster_airbyte
      - requirements:
          run:
            - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        script: dagster-airbyte --help
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/dagster-airbyte
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for integrating Airbyte with Dagster.

  - package:
      name: dagster-aws
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-aws/dagster_aws-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 792232d074104be4f9d46b6b399d5bd609d7668a74a6ebb60dec2f7c24851f6b
    build:
      noarch: python
      skip: python_min != real_python_min
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - boto3
        - packaging
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        - requests
    tests:
      - python:
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
          imports:
            - dagster_aws
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/dagster-aws
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for AWS-specific Dagster framework solid and resource components.
  # B
  # C
  - package:
      name: dagster-celery
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-celery/dagster_celery-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 271c0699116fae3b8921ae237192a662963c87102dccb53e31b0c5b79301aaca
    build:
      noarch: python
      skip: python_min != real_python_min
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
      python:
        entry_points:
          - dagster-celery = dagster_celery.cli:main
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - celery >=4.3.0
        - click >=5.0,<9.0
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
          imports:
            - dagster_celery
      - requirements:
          run:
            - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        script: dagster-celery --help

    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/blob/master/python_modules/dagster-celery
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for using Celery as Dagster's execution engine.

  - package:
      name: dagster-celery-docker
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-celery-docker/dagster_celery_docker-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 10d8e343960a49d082ea9d0b9f45719b59f591547bceb0b9c4b67ba42d761b72
    build:
      noarch: python
      skip: python_min != real_python_min
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ pin_subpackage("dagster-celery", upper_bound="x.x.x") }}
        - dagster-graphql ==1.12.15
        - docker-py
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
          imports:
            - dagster_celery_docker
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/blob/master/python_modules/dagster-celery-docker
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: A Dagster integration for celery-docker

  - package:
      name: dagster-celery-k8s
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-celery-k8s/dagster_celery_k8s-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 89b1de61a665bd5eaac430329e245ce99ddfbcaf27a535ff390878c393147954
    build:
      noarch: python
      skip: python_min != real_python_min
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ pin_subpackage("dagster-celery", upper_bound="x.x.x") }}
        - ${{ pin_subpackage("dagster-k8s", upper_bound="x.x.x") }}
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
          imports:
            - dagster_celery_k8s
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/blob/master/python_modules/dagster-celery-k8s
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: A Dagster integration for celery-k8s-executor

  - package:
      name: dagster-census
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-census/dagster_census-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 76f9b4d751ed1e5ad64957ecdf4941d9f19cbc961b4cfa87cff92ec710614055
    build:
      noarch: python
      skip: python_min != real_python_min
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
          imports:
            - dagster_census
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/blob/master/python_modules/dagster-census
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for integrating Census with Dagster.

  # D
  - package:
      name: dagster-dask
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-dask/dagster_dask-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 247234fd2f566b500e3bc26512bf46962187d12e661b853804d4676011e29a6c
    build:
      noarch: python
      skip: python_min != real_python_min
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - bokeh
        - dask >=1.2.2
        - distributed >=1.28.1
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
      run_constraints:
        # https://github.com/conda-forge/dagster-libs-feedstock/pull/217
        # vs dask 2023.3.0
        #    File "$PREFIX/lib/python3.14/site-packages/dask/array/einsumfuncs.py", line 2, in <module>
        #      from numpy.compat import basestring
        #  ModuleNotFoundError: No module named 'numpy.compat'
        - dask >=2024
    tests:
      - python:
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
          imports:
            - dagster_dask
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/dagster-dask
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for using Dask as Dagster's execution engine.

  - package:
      name: dagster-datadog
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-datadog/dagster_datadog-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: befa843bbb744a40f1cb6d321a51a18fc0f566dac4e8f5fe12d1f34d538b129e
    build:
      noarch: python
      skip: python_min != real_python_min
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - datadog
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
          imports:
            - dagster_datadog
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/libraries/dagster-datadog
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for datadog Dagster framework components.

  - package:
      name: dagster-dbt
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-dbt/dagster_dbt-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: da1db0c0dba9ff66bd20bb6ed02f05dffe53ced1ffadc3c00134359284d562ad
    build:
      noarch: python
      skip: python_min != real_python_min
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
      python:
        entry_points:
          - dagster-dbt-cloud = dagster_dbt.cloud.cli:app
          - dagster-dbt = dagster_dbt.cli.app:app
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - dbt-core >=1.7,<1.12
        - gitpython
        - jinja2
        - networkx
        - orjson
        - packaging
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        - requests
        - rich
        - sqlglot-rs <28.1.0
        - typer >=0.9.0
    tests:
      - python:
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - 3.13.*
          imports:
            - dagster_dbt
      - requirements:
          run:
            - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        script:
          - dagster-dbt-cloud --help
          - dagster-dbt --help
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/dagster-dbt
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: A Dagster integration for dbt

  - package:
      name: dagster-deltalake
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-deltalake/dagster_deltalake-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 3dd5bf7682055ee0ecc47dba12c8bf275e41ddab6e691737b2a175b528177f14
    build:
      noarch: python
      skip: python_min != real_python_min
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - deltalake >=1.0.0
        - pyarrow
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_deltalake
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/dagster-deltalake
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for Deltalake-specific Dagster framework op and resource components.

  - package:
      name: dagster-deltalake-pandas
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-deltalake-pandas/dagster_deltalake_pandas-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: e6be7b73e9270175c9eceb7953650423911dab23877081d1786fa60daaa920a7
    build:
      noarch: python
      skip: python_min != real_python_min
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ pin_subpackage("dagster-deltalake", upper_bound="x.x.x") }}
        - pandas <3.0.0
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_deltalake_pandas
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/dagster-deltalake-pandas
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for storing Pandas DataFrames in Delta tables

  - package:
      name: dagster-deltalake-polars
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-deltalake-polars/dagster_deltalake_polars-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 9ae32dbde57b04098b237136f59b2c8e046a38bbacdab9aed3ff222a167ca70b
    build:
      noarch: python
      skip: python_min != real_python_min
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ pin_subpackage("dagster-deltalake", upper_bound="x.x.x") }}
        - polars
        - pyarrow
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_deltalake_polars
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/dagster-deltalake-polars
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for storing Polars DataFrames in Delta tables.

  - package:
      name: dagster-dlt
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-dlt/dagster_dlt-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: b62aa760a19334697d799bf0bbc683791eb8903471a02dccb2d24de965b9b2ac
    build:
      noarch: python
      skip: python_min != real_python_min
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - dlt >=0.4
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_dlt
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - 3.13.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/libraries/dagster-dlt
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: This library provides a Dagster integration with dlt

  - package:
      name: dagster-docker
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-docker/dagster_docker-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: a3224ddb5823af7287b07b618d158a22348095cc663a24cfcaaf6335b062c4fe
    build:
      noarch: python
      skip: python_min != real_python_min
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - docker-image-py
        - docker-py
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_docker
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*

    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/libraries/dagster-docker
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: A Dagster integration for docker

  - package:
      name: dagster-duckdb
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-duckdb/dagster_duckdb-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 722ac00aebb95b540496b24cc68f7d8c460a243c55a869f039f3c4cb2d825f0c
    build:
      noarch: python
      # used by dagster-duckdb-pyspark
      # skip: python_min != real_python_min
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        - python-duckdb
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_duckdb
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/blob/master/python_modules/dagster-duckdb
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for DuckDB-specific Dagster framework op and resource components.

  - package:
      name: dagster-duckdb-pandas
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-duckdb-pandas/dagster_duckdb_pandas-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: eca2129f28681a6d6e8216d7f56f04be9046ff678da980acda8e2f112b456e67
    build:
      noarch: python
      skip: python_min != real_python_min
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ pin_subpackage("dagster-duckdb", upper_bound="x.x.x") }}
        - pandas <3.0.0
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_duckdb_pandas
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/blob/master/python_modules/dagster-duckdb-pandas
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for storing Pandas DataFrames in DuckDB.

  - package:
      name: dagster-duckdb-polars
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-duckdb-polars/dagster_duckdb_polars-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: a6c6f521a06f618ee66f25190fb1e62b3b1a770d5007948006ab87fe5fb86e32
    build:
      noarch: python
      skip: python_min != real_python_min
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ pin_subpackage("dagster-duckdb", upper_bound="x.x.x") }}
        - polars
        - pyarrow
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_duckdb_polars
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/blob/master/python_modules/dagster-duckdb-polars
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for storing Polars DataFrames in DuckDB.

  - package:
      name: dagster-duckdb-pyspark
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-duckdb-pyspark/dagster_duckdb_pyspark-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 95d76e2acfb8e7162b7da14d6664690728ada13e0dc21520cd73cc1393a8f379
    build:
      noarch: python
      # skip: python_min != real_python_min
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ pin_subpackage("dagster-duckdb", upper_bound="x.x.x") }}
        - pandas <3.0.0
        - pyarrow
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        - if: match(python_min, "<3.14")
          then: pyspark >=3.5,<4
        - if: match(python_min, ">=3.14")
          then: pyspark >=4.1
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_duckdb_pyspark
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/blob/master/python_modules/dagster-duckdb-pyspark
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for storing PySpark DataFrames in DuckDB.

  # E
  # F
  - package:
      name: dagster-fivetran
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-fivetran/dagster_fivetran-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 8a65b323cf2cebee75790dcdb9cb6c1a6eb1863f23eb5a4b0b22764cc593b02a
    build:
      noarch: python
      skip: python_min != real_python_min
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
      python:
        entry_points:
          - dagster-fivetran = dagster_fivetran.cli:main
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_fivetran
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
      - requirements:
          run:
            - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        script:
          - dagster-fivetran --help
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/libraries/dagster-fivetran

  # G
  - package:
      name: dagster-gcp
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-gcp/dagster_gcp-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: dbb19ba76508803aa80200afab1314a5024b2edbafa8b218ec2e67e6f1ed7a7c
    build:
      noarch: python
      # needed by dagster-gcp-pyspark
      # skip: python_min != real_python_min
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ pin_subpackage("dagster-pandas", upper_bound="x.x.x") }}
        - db-dtypes
        - google-api-python-client
        - google-cloud-bigquery-core >=1.28.3
        - google-cloud-storage
        - oauth2client
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          imports:
            - dagster_gcp
            - dagster_gcp.bigquery
            - dagster_gcp.dataproc
            - dagster_gcp.gcs
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/libraries/dagster-gcp
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for GCP-specific Dagster framework solid and resource components.

        - ${{ pin_subpackage("dagster-gcp", upper_bound="x.x.x") }}

  - package:
      name: dagster-gcp-pyspark
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-gcp-pyspark/dagster_gcp_pyspark-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 87f6be02112bbe2ab2a519a2e61d6d081f6dd43c12277c1850b98c13b2b059f9
    build:
      noarch: python
      # skip: python_min != real_python_min
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ pin_subpackage("dagster-gcp", upper_bound="x.x.x") }}
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        - if: match(python_min, "<3.14")
          then: pyspark >=3.5,<4
        - if: match(python_min, ">=3.14")
          then: pyspark >=4.1
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_gcp_pyspark
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/libraries/dagster-gcp-pyspark
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for storing PySpark DataFrames in GCP

  - package:

      sha256: e215173f701b3170ad6d850e3831f4583d36e12b5b4e7cff71a7ab19dccc1b8b
    build:
      noarch: python
      skip: python_min != real_python_min
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
      python:
        entry_points:
          - dagster-managed-elements = dagster_managed_elements.cli:main
          - dagster-me = dagster_managed_elements.cli:main
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - click-spinner
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        - requests
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_managed_elements
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
      - requirements:
          run:
            - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        script:
          - dagster-managed-elements --help
          - dagster-me --help
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/libraries/dagster-managed-elements
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for Managed elements with Dagster.

  - package:
      name: dagster-mlflow
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-mlflow/dagster_mlflow-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 9aa52bf75257e3f743ceafd0ee56e83eb29a43131e1d5412699364418a9b0d1c
    build:
      noarch: python
      skip: python_min != real_python_min
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - mlflow
        - pandas <3.0.0
        - protobuf !=5.29.0
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
      run_constraints:
        # https://github.com/conda-forge/dagster-libs-feedstock/pull/217
        # fails with mlflow 1.26.1
        #    File "$SRC_DIR_env/lib/python3.10/site-packages/mlflow/protos/service_pb2.py", line 11, in <module>
        #      from google.protobuf import service as _service
        #    ImportError: cannot import name 'service' from 'google.protobuf' ($SRC_DIR_env/lib/python3.10/site-packages/google/protobuf/__init__.py)
        - mlflow >=2
    tests:
      - python:
          # as of #60, see `dagster-mlflow X requires mlflow, which is not installed``
          # due to some "clever" packaging tricks with mlflow(-skinny)
          # pip_check: true
          imports: dagster_mlflow
          pip_check: false
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/libraries/dagster-mlflow
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for mlflow Dagster framework components

      name: dagster-sigma
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-sigma/dagster_sigma-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 1d133bbea51d5b69efc1b20c217bc30079eab42423d1d1835fe1671a1b62af3e
    build:
      noarch: python
      skip: python_min != real_python_min
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
      python:
        entry_points:
          - dagster-sigma = dagster_sigma.cli:app
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - aiohttp
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        - sqlglot
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_sigma
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
      - requirements:
          run:
            - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        script:
          - which dagster-sigma || where dagster-sigma
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/libraries/dagster-sigma
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Build assets representing Sigma dashboards.

  - package:
      name: dagster-slack
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-slack/dagster_slack-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 63da3026b87009efd1e2dbd999fd8e07c82b40700e2000b900d29be54a8df948
    build:
      noarch: python
      skip: python_min != real_python_min
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        - slack-sdk
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_slack
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/libraries/dagster-slack
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: A Slack client resource for posting to Slack

  - package:
      name: dagster-snowflake
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-snowflake/dagster_snowflake-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 18669b294dfa252855b28fe92029f1ef0990e105fb0ab7fd46db299aafb35890
    build:
      skip: python_min != real_python_min
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - pyopenssl >=22.1.0
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        - snowflake-connector-python >=3.4.0
        - snowflake-snowpark-python >=1.24.0
        - snowflake.core >=1.8.0
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_snowflake
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_snowflake_max }}.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/libraries/dagster-snowflake
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for Snowflake Dagster framework components.

  - package:
      name: dagster-snowflake-pandas
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-snowflake-pandas/dagster_snowflake_pandas-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: eb79b342b2e6708a7681edb56d995118007f01fddaef50806b5564e8e8a08c0d
    build:
      skip: python_min != real_python_min
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ pin_subpackage("dagster-snowflake", upper_bound="x.x.x") }}
        - pandas
        - pandas <3.0.0
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        - requests
        - snowflake-connector-python
        - snowflake-sqlalchemy >=1.2
        - sqlalchemy !=1.4.42
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_snowflake_pandas
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_snowflake_max }}.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/libraries/dagster-snowflake-pandas
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for integrating Snowflake and Pandas with Dagster.

  - package:
      name: dagster-snowflake-pyspark
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-snowflake-pyspark/dagster_snowflake_pyspark-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 5a6f0484659442ab595d81fcd986c56a58b0f2dde0156c1032b58f6f9d133e10
    build:
      skip: python_min != real_python_min
      noarch: python
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ${{ pin_subpackage("dagster-snowflake", upper_bound="x.x.x") }}
        - pyspark <4
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        - requests
        - snowflake-sqlalchemy >=1.2
        - sqlalchemy !=1.4.42
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_snowflake_pyspark
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_snowflake_pyspark_max }}.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/libraries/dagster-snowflake-pyspark
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for integrating Snowflake and PySpark with Dagster.

  - package:
      name: dagster-spark
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-spark/dagster_spark-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 82f2093a7b203b43e434286f8d60d5edb4a908f8e6ef7c1fcb76fea71a0e1ab9
    build:
      noarch: python
      # used by other dagster-*-pyspark
      # skip: python_min != real_python_min
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_spark
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/libraries/dagster-spark
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for Spark Dagster framework components.

  - package:
      name: dagster-ssh
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-ssh/dagster_ssh-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 573db1a3e4dd65fd50cb51bbc9c4ed5f84527952d0ce73e6ea67e35b6ac82e22
    build:
      noarch: python
      skip: python_min != real_python_min
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - paramiko
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        - sshtunnel
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_ssh
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/libraries/dagster-ssh
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for ssh Dagster framework components.

  # T
  - package:
      name: dagster-tableau
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-tableau/dagster_tableau-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 25011fbd771d482a7cfae3403f60c77f6f27512fb315ee0cbc324b6a22526e49
    build:
      noarch: python
      skip: python_min != real_python_min
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - cryptography >=1.4
        - pyjwt
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        - tableauserverclient >=0.32
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_tableau
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/libraries/dagster-tableau
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Build assets representing Tableau workbooks and sheets.

  - package:
      name: dagster-twilio
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-twilio/dagster_twilio-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: e08ea5b9192c937b7e9c24ed0d080896cf37e2944eae964098e99510a327d893
    build:
      noarch: python
      skip: python_min != real_python_min
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        - twilio
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_twilio
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/libraries/dagster-twilio
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: A Dagster integration for twilio

  # U
  # V
  # W
  - package:
      name: dagster-wandb
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagster-wandb/dagster_wandb-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: 4a24425b5732dbb669695acf644991b8403cd772a54824fd776c6d15ea562f64
    build:
      noarch: python
      skip: python_min != real_python_min
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        - wandb >=0.15.11,<1.0
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagster_wandb
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/dagster-wandb
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: Package for wandb Dagster components.

  # X
  # Y
  # Z

  # not hyphenated

  - package:
      name: dagstermill
    source:
      url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/d/dagstermill/dagstermill-${{ version }}.tar.gz
      sha256: e323d116068465d244d2077792fd6e83a8743ee088c988f4e4a8f0b214d329cb
    build:
      noarch: python
      skip: python_min != real_python_min
      script: ${{ PYTHON }} ${{ pip_install }}
      python:
        entry_points:
          - dagstermill = dagstermill.cli:main
    requirements:
      host:
        - pip
        - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        - setuptools
      run:
        - ${{ dagster }}
        - ipykernel >=4.9.0,!=5.4.0,!=5.4.1
        - ipython_genutils >=0.2.0
        - jupyter_client <8
        - nbconvert
        - packaging >=20.9
        - papermill >=1.0.0
        - python >=${{ python_min }}
        - scrapbook >=0.5.0
    tests:
      - python:
          imports: dagstermill
          pip_check: true
          python_version:
            - ${{ python_min }}.*
            - ${{ python_max }}.*
      - requirements:
          run:
            - python ${{ python_min }}.*
        script:
          - dagstermill --help
    about:
      homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io/dagster/tree/master/python_modules/dagstermill
      license: Apache-2.0
      license_file: LICENSE
      summary: A Dagster integration for papermill

about:
  homepage: https://github.com/dagster-io
  summary: The data orchestration platform built for productivity.
  license: Apache-2.0
  license_file: LICENSE
  documentation: https://docs.dagster.io
  description: >-
    Dagster is a system for building modern data applications. Combining an elegant programming model and beautiful tools, Dagster allows infrastructure engineers, data engineers, and data scientists to seamlessly collaborate to process and produce the trusted, reliable data needed in today's world.

extra:
  feedstock-name: dagster-libs
  recipe-maintainers:
    - bollwyvl
    - conda-forge/dagster
